name: UIGravityBehavior
desc: An object that applies a gravity-like force to all of its associated dynamic items.

items.name: init(items: [UIDynamicItem])
items.desc: Initializes a gravity behavior with an array of dynamic items.

items.name: var items: [UIDynamicItem]
items.desc: The set of dynamic items associated with the gravity behavior.

items.name: func addItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Associates the specified dynamic item with the gravity behavior.

items.name: func removeItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Removes the specified dynamic item from the gravity behavior.

items.name: var gravityDirection: CGVector
items.desc: The direction and magnitude of the gravitational force, expressed as a vector.

items.name: var angle: CGFloat
items.desc: The direction of the gravity vector, expressed in radians in the reference coordinate system.

items.name: var magnitude: CGFloat
items.desc: The magnitude of the gravity vector.

items.name: func setAngle(CGFloat, magnitude: CGFloat)
items.desc: Sets the angle and magnitude of the gravity vector for the behavior.
